title: 'Value For Money Blanket'
body: I'm very glad that I have bought this blanket. I was looking for a warm and soft blanket that would be perfect for all seasons, and this ticks all the boxes. It's made of 100% polyester polar fleece, which is super soft and cozy. It's also lightweight highly so highly recommended blanket for all.

title: 'Not satisfied..'
body: While giving good ranking to the quality of material used, the workmanship is very poor, the fabric is cut in a slanted manner and stitched in a shoddy manner, it seems they have no quality control, may be a product that is bought in bulk, branded locally and sold off, don't buy, amazon must issue instructions to all dealers to give equal importance to workmanship..
